of his hussars and still farther ahead a dark line which he could not see distinctly but took to be the enemy. Shots could be heard, but some way off. 
"Faster!" came the word of command, and Rost6v felt Rook's flanks drooping as he broke into a gallop. 
Rost6v anticipated his horse's movements and became more and more elated. He had noticed a solitary tree ahead of him. This tree had been in the middle of the line that had seemed so terrible and now he had crossed that line and not only was th
